mods.abstract: One color half sheet (blue on white) announcing a Food Show at the Motor Square Garden from February 17 to February 28. Poster was sponsored by the Pittsburgh Railways Company and designed and printed by the Exhibitors Program and Show Print Company.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
